message.content:
Douglas and Jerry are both ancestors of Roy. Douglas is connected to Roy through a long chain of descendants: Douglas → Sophia → Elijah → Billy → Eric → Jason → Philip → Laura → Diane → Bryan → Gregory → Steven → Daniel → Jordan → Arthur → Kimberly → Shirley → Julie → Brenda → Albert → Nancy → Kathryn → Jonathan → Willie → Dorothy → Vincent → Dennis → Beverly → Linda → David → Peter → Marie → Doris → Nathan → William → Natalie → Cynthia → Alexander → Gary → Roy. Jerry is also connected to Roy through another chain: Jerry → Theresa → Henry → Carolyn → Scott → Ralph → Austin → Denise → Barbara → Bobby → Paul → Marilyn → Jennifer → Judith → Jean → Wayne → Samantha → Alan → Amber → Frances → Terry → Donald → Emily → Christine → Melissa → Carl → Bruce → Lawrence → Noah → Jeffrey → Larry → Aaron → Charlotte → Tyler → Donna → Janice → Michael → Jeremy → Thomas → Logan → Charles → Samuel → Angela → Gloria → Patrick → Timothy → Adam → Karen → Abigail → Alice → Grace → Joseph → Debra → Judy → Maria → Jack → Joan → Lori → Zachary → Ashley → Elizabeth → Kevin → Andrew → Patricia → Kayla → Gabriel → Diana → Cheryl → Benjamin → Raymond → Kelly → Lisa → Brian → Margaret → Richard → Kyle → Michelle → Betty → Madison → Sharon → Joe → Nicholas → Hannah → Christina → Lauren → Carol → Joshua → Sarah → Rebecca → Dylan → Mark → Danielle → Juan → Robert → James → Andrea → Sara → Ethan → Alexis → Kathleen → Stephanie → Gerald → Olivia → Kenneth → Justin → Rachel → Randy → Frank → Helen → Roger → Catherine → Jacqueline → Eugene → Deborah → Nicole → Virginia → Walter → Anthony → Mary → Heather → Harold → Jacob → Amy → Brittany → Pamela → Stephen → Sean → Julia → Ronald → Jessica → Jesse → John → Jose → Brandon → Amanda → Christian → Katherine → Evelyn → Bradley → Sandra → Susan → Ryan → Joyce → Megan → Edward → Ruth → Isabella → Matthew → Anna → Keith → Russell → Christopher → Roy. Since Roy is a descendant of both Douglas and Jerry, they share a common descendant.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
